biotools.summary: This package provides classes and methods for gene set over-representation, enrichment and network analyses on high-throughput screens. A pipeline is also specifically designed for cellHTS2 object to perform integrative network analyses of high-throughput RNA interference screens. The users can build their own analysis pipeline for their own data set based on this package.

bioschemas.name: HTSanalyzeR
